column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////This is such a beautiful restaurant
column2: the decor is lovely.  The lighting
column4: and atmosphere make the meal even better.  Our waiter was knowledgeable
column6: and offered suggestions for our meals.  We had a filet and lamb chops
column7: both beautifully made.  Cocktails were lovely.  We then had a chocolate cream pie that was made by God's own hand.  It was amazing.
